# SMBCyberHub

> High-authority, "No-SaaS" cybersecurity compliance kits for SMBs.

## Core Value Proposition
- **Philosophy:** Privacy-first, one-time download, zero-subscription cybersecurity.
- **Problem Solved:** Removes the "SaaS Tax" and data privacy risks associated with cloud-based compliance tools.
- **Target Audience:** Small to Medium Businesses (SMBs) needing rapid audit readiness.

## Compliance Mapping
All kits are architected to map directly to:
- NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) 2.0
- GDPR Article 39 (Staff Training)
- Cyber Insurance Readiness Requirements
- ISO/IEC 27001 (Basic Controls)

## Key Products
- **Pro Cyber Awareness Kit:** Turnkey training and policy suite.
- **Policy Templates:** Human-edited, legally vetted security documentation.

## Unique Differentiators
- **No-SaaS Approach:** All materials are downloadable and stored locally, eliminating third-party data exposure.
- **30-Minute Implementation:** Designed for rapid deployment without IT expertise.
- **Audit-Ready Documentation:** Everything needed for insurance renewals and compliance audits.

## Expertise Foundation
Developed by CISSP & CISM certified professionals with 20+ years of enterprise cybersecurity experience, translated for SMB needs.

## Contact
- Website: https://smbcyberhub.com
- Support: info@smbcyberhub.com
